SEARCH

Class HMSDatabase

java.lang.Object
HMSDatabase
public class HMSDatabase extends Object
Singleton class that serves as the central data repository for the Hospital Management System Manages all system data including users, appointments, medical records, prescriptions and medicine inventory

  • Method Summary

    Description

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the database with data from CSV files After loading, saves the initialized data through serialization
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If any required CSV file is missing
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unknown staff role is encountered

    • save

      public boolean save()
      Saves all system data through serialization
      Returns:
      boolean True if save successful, false if any errors occur

    • load

      public boolean load()
      Loads all system data from serialized files
      Returns:
      boolean True if load successful, false if any errors occur
